sessionSlotsJsonList.title: sessionSlotsJsonList
sessionSlotsJsonList.description:
Provide the agent with an array of SessionSlot records to be upserted. They should be passed as a list of Strings, the first of which contains JSON in the following format: 
[
  {
    "sessionSlotId": "a0C1c0000012345",
    "sessionId": "a0A1a0000012345",
    "sessionLocationId": "a0B1b0000012345",
    "slotDate": "2024-06-15",
    "startTime": "09:00:00.000Z",
    "endTime": "10:30:00.000Z",
    "sessionName": "Introduction to AI",
    "locationName": "Main Ballroom A",
    "roomCapacity": 200,
    "roomSize": "Large (151+)",
    "isDraft": false
  },
  {
    "sessionSlotId": null,
    "sessionId": "a0A1a0000012346",
    "sessionLocationId": "a0B1b0000012346",
    "slotDate": "2024-06-15",
    "startTime": "11:00:00.000Z",
    "endTime": "12:00:00.000Z",
    "sessionName": "Advanced Machine Learning",
    "locationName": "Conference Room B",
    "roomCapacity": 50,
    "roomSize": "Medium (50-150)",
    "isDraft": true
  }
]
